title.text: Toward an Underspecifiable Corpus Annotation Scheme

abstractContent.text: The Wall Street Journal corpora provided for the Workshop on Cross-Framework and Cross-Domain Parser Evaluation Shared Task are investigated in order to see how the structures that are difficult for an annotator of dependency structure are encoded in the different schemes.
Non-trivial differences among the schemes are found.
The paper also investigates the possibility of merging the information encoded in the different corpora .
